data.scheme_name: Assistance under Export Credit guarantee Corporation Scheme-New as per policy - New
data.benefits: Scheme provides reimbursement of 50% of premium paid on insurance upto maximum of Rs.1.5 lakhs per annum per unit for 5 years for having ZED Certification.
data.eligibility: All micro and small units operating anywhere in the Haryana State are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The unit must file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) for statistical purposes. 
  2. The unit should have obtained No objection certificate from the Competent Authority, if applicable. 
  3. The unit must be in commercial production. 
  4. The unit should be in regular production at the time of disbursement; subsidies won't be released to closed units. 
  5. The unit must have Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) certification.
data.beneficiaries: All micro and small units operating anywhere in the Haryana State are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The unit must file Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM) for statistical purposes. 
  2. The unit should have obtained No objection certificate from the Competent Authority, if applicable. 
  3. The unit must be in commercial production. 
  4. The unit should be in regular production at the time of disbursement; subsidies won't be released to closed units. 
  5. The unit must have Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) certification.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: To provide range of credit risk insurance covers to exporters against loss in export of goods, failure of buyers and also other unforeseen losses operating Micro and Small enterprises in the State.
data.objective: To provide range of credit risk insurance covers to exporters against loss in export of goods, failure of buyers and also other unforeseen losses operating Micro and Small enterprises in the State.
data.description: Scheme provides reimbursement of 50% of premium paid on insurance upto maximum of Rs.1.5 lakhs per annum per unit for a period of 5 years for having ZED Certification.
data.how_to_apply:
Application in the prescribed Form for the assistance, along with listed documents would be submitted to the Director/ DirectorGeneral, Industries & Commerce/Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, through the web portal of the department. 

Annexure-I : https://cdnbbsr.s3waas.gov.in/s3f48c04ffab49ff0e5d1176244fdfb65c/uploads/2022/06/2022060256.pdf
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf 

Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
i.Copy of Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM). 
ii. Certificate of Incorporation/ Partnership deed/Partnership registration/ Co- operative society 
registration. 
iii. Board resolution/ Power of attorney. 
iv. Change of Land Use (CLU)/ NOC from competent authority, if applicable. 
v. Copy of GST return/Audited Balance Sheet for last financial year. 
vi. Declaration by the applicant (as per Annexure II) on non-judicial stamp paper of Rs. 50/- (Min) 
duly sworn before a Notary Public or First-Class Magistrate. 
vii. Documentary evidence towards premium paid towards Export Credit Insurance.
data.checklist_info_d: 1st Floor, 30 Bays Building,Sector17, Chandigarh, Ph: 0172-2701344, Email: ipcharyana@yahoo.com
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing Industry - All Entities - Haryana - MSEs
